item.description:
Saturday, 11 am to 3 pm... but you must come early to pick out the best bowl!
This is Foodshare's annual Empty Bowls project at Manchester Community College.

Empty Bowls is a fun and filling way to give to Foodshare and bring home some hand-crafted pottery. At the MCC culinary center you can make a suggested donation to Foodshare, select your special bowl crafted by local potters and MCC art students and fill it (as many times as you like)with soup from local restaurants and MCC's amazing student chefs.

From 10 am to 3 pm the Manchester Art Association Craft Fair will also be taking place at the college.  Come early - Stay later, and get a jump on your holiday shopping!
item.how_to_find_us: Meet us at 10:30 for bowl selection!
item.name: Empty Bowls Event
